title: vandanai purindu
sahitya:
vandanai purindu nal vAzhvinaip-peru manamE kandanin pAdAravinda malarinai nI


anupallavi

  sendUrinai sEra nondu vandOriDam cintai kanindaruL sorindiDum sImAnai


caraNam    enda innalum unnai vandu vadaikkAmal cintaik-kavalaiyAl siridum padaikkAmal
bandha pAsham vilagi inda ulaginil enda nALumE nalam ellAm eidiDa nI
